Subjects return clinic Days 10 , 12 , 14 , 16 , 18 22 repeat blood draw safety lab . Day 22 final study visit .
DOC.brief_title: Examination Safety Tolerability NNC 0070-0002-0349 Overweight/Obese Volunteers
DOC.criteria: BMI great 27.0 less 35.0 kg/m2 Systolic blood pressure great 140 mm Hg diastolic great 90 mm Hg Depression suicidal thought ( Scoring Patient Health Questionnaire9item ) Eating disorder Unusual diet eat habit Dieting , use diet drug obesity surgery Diabetes history abnormal fasting glucose
